db:abstract.db:para: The Easing Curves example shows how to use easing curves to control the speed of an animation.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += widgets
HEADERS = window.h \ animation.h SOURCES = main.cpp \ window.cpp
FORMS = form.ui
RESOURCES = easing.qrc
# install target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/widgets/animation/easing INSTALLS += target
